        public static SoundManager getInstance()

      • registerSound

        public net.minecraft.util.SoundEvent registerSound(java.lang.String containerName,
                                                   java.lang.String soundName)
        从接口复制的说明: ISoundManager
        Register a SoundEvent with custom containerName.

        Custom containerName of soundName but not ModuleContainer.

        指定者:
        registerSound 在接口中 ISoundManager
        参数:
        containerName - The name of mod or module.
        soundName - The name of the sound in the resources' directory.
        返回:
        The created SoundEvent.

      • registerSound

        public net.minecraft.util.SoundEvent registerSound(java.lang.String soundName)
        从接口复制的说明: ISoundManager
        Register a SoundEvent.

        Default to using the current active ModuleContainer id, must be registered in the Pre-Initialization Event phase.

        指定者:
        registerSound 在接口中 ISoundManager
        参数:
        soundName - The name of the sound in the resources' directory.
        返回:
        The created SoundEvent.

      • startTileSound

        public net.minecraft.client.audio.ISound startTileSound(net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation soundName,
                                                        float volume,
                                                        net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
        从接口复制的说明: ISoundManager
        Starts a positioned sound at a provided BlockPos.
        指定者:
        startTileSound 在接口中 ISoundManager
        参数:
        soundName - The name of the sound to play.
        volume - The volume multiplier of the sound.
        pos - The position to play the sound at.
        返回:
        The sound that was played.

      • stopTileSound

        public void stopTileSound(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
        从接口复制的说明: ISoundManager
        Stops the positioned sound playing at a given BlockPos (if any).
        指定者:
        stopTileSound 在接口中 ISoundManager
        参数:
        pos - The position to play the sound at.
